name: Gitonga Nyaga

about_me: A dynamic and innovative software developer with a passion for building cutting-edge applications that leverage AI and modern technologies. My journey through Fullstack Academy and current role at Outlier AI has equipped me with a robust foundation in full-stack development, microservices architecture, and AI integration. I excel at creating scalable solutions that solve real-world problems, particularly in healthcare technology and AI-powered systems. My experience includes developing microservices, AI assistants, and healthcare applications, demonstrating my versatility and commitment to staying at the forefront of technology. I am driven by the opportunity to create impactful solutions that push the boundaries of what's possible in software development.
achievements: Developed and deployed an AI-powered job search assistant using OpenAI's GPT-4 and microservices architecture
Created a healthcare application with HIPAA-compliant data handling and secure API integrations
Built and maintained microservices-based applications with high availability and scalability
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment
Successfully completed intensive web development training at Fullstack Academy
Contributed to the development of AI-powered applications at Outlier AI
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints for various applications
Mentored by industry professionals and rapidly adapted to new technologies and methodologies
